                                  `,,`


http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3576392
Bigtreetech SKR v1.3 Sterpper driver cooler by Nitec0re is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Non-Commercial license.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

# Summary

This is a simple "snap-on" fan shroud for the Bigtreetech SKR v1.3 board to cool the stepper drivers in closed case. There are two version. One is "fan up" and one "fan down. That means from which direction the fan sucks the air in.

All connectors still accessible.

# Print Settings

Printer: Creality Cr10S-Pro
Rafts: No
Supports: Yes
Resolution: 0.2
Infill: 20
Filament_brand: ---
Filament_material: PETG
